attributes.title: Don’t download. Very dangerous!!!
attributes.review: This app is soooo dangerous. ‼️ It hacks your phone camera and looks at you to see what race you are. ✊🏾🧕🏾If you’re a minority, it will notify the government and they’ll send the FBI and the space force to your house to chop off your arms and your 2 big toes 💪🏾🦶🏾 (I had to type this review with my pinky toes). Donald Trump is trying to collect the arms and toes of all minorities so he can complete the ritual that will grant him immortality and privilege for all eternity.🍊🥺 If you’re a minority or really tan, this app is not safe for you ❌🆘

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review:
Awful app!! 🤮🤮🤮

I got this app to see this dude’s updates but when I opened the app all I saw was a giant potato 🥔on my screen!! 😮 I was in shock! When I tried to exit out of the app I couldn’t. I had to power off my phone, and power it back on. After that happened, all my apps were deleted except for the App Store. Thank god. But worst of all my backgrounds were changed to the same potato 🥔 I saw in the app. I would not recommend to my worst enemies. This app makes me sick to the core! 🤢🤮😡

attributes.title: This app is HORRIBLE!
attributes.review: This app is terrible! As soon as I downloaded it I got sharp and itchy uterus pains. The grass in my lawn turned brown and all of the tap water in my house became spicy. Life is bland with this app! It’s so horrible it makes my toes itch and clench with fear! Donald Trump looks like an orange Ne-YO on heroin! God forbid trump sends someone to my house to assassinate me but it must be said. This app is HORRIBLE!!! My dog went bald because of this app!!!! TAKE IT DOWN!!!!! My teeth are falling out one by one and there are roaches creeping and crawling in my bed because this app is infected! ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTED!!! DELETE IMMEDIATELY!!

attributes.title: VIRUS
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to get news on what our non racist, non sexist, and non homophobic president could be doing. I was ready for the wonderful deeds that I’d get notified on, instead I have received unwanted guest. My devices was completely fine before but now I have like 134 viruses. I’m pretty sure I’ve gotten hacked into some of my private accounts. Along with it my devices have been really slow. Even after I deleted the app my devices still remain slow. THIS IS A WARNING DON’T GET THIS APP UNLESS YOU WANT PERMANENT DAMAGE. Miss Obama.

attributes.title: Man this app was a wasssteee offf timme
attributes.review: I’m not throwing away my shot, I am not throwing away my shot, hey yo I’m just like my country I am young scrappy and hungry and I’m not throwing away my shot. I hope this app burns and it will never make me satisfied. This app is Helpless just like Trumps campaign. Let’s steal the canons and blow them all away, because we have the spirit of Hamilton and the heart of Eliza, the ambition of Lafayette and the courage of Philip. We aren’t gonna wait for it, we are gonna go non stop until this app is shut down along with this campaign.

attributes.title: This app makes my blood BOIL 😡😡😡😡
attributes.review: Okay so it all started last week when I downloaded the app. Everything was fine until it started blowing up my phone with notifications, then my phone literally blew up!!! It’s fine though my phone was in the oven. I’m writing this review on my new iPod 3. I’m just so mad because I had to get a new iPod and this one will probably blow up too!! Also my 27 pet rats and cats tried to eat my iPod and I was worried they’d all be injured. Overall horrible app DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT WILL BREAK YOUR PHONE!!!!

attributes.title: A Disappointment at the Least
attributes.review:
I am very disappointed with this app for many reasons. Firstly, the app crashed many times while I was trying to use it. Also, my fingers get VERY tired from clicking all these buttons!! Preposterous!!! I expected SO much more from OUR president 😠 I am also very concerned with the content of this app. I am confused as to why, in the age rating, “suggestive themes” are present in this app. 😕
I am overall very disappointed with this app and will be rating it 0 stars.

attributes.title: Worst App EVER
attributes.review: Before I downloaded this app my phone was perfectly fine but when I opened the app my phone started to glitch. So, I turned off my phone then I turned it back on, but it was still glitching i don’t know why anyone would ever want this app considering all the glitches. I had to take it to the apple store to get it fixed and they deleted everything, so I advise you not to get this app unless you want to have everything taken away from you.

attributes.title: gave my sons brain stds
attributes.review: Downloaded to learn about the President and all I learned was that looking at this content physically makes your brain malfunction in such a way that you get an std of the brain. Extremely disappointed because now all my information is hacked and my sons had to put a stop to their life work of solving world hunger while they battle their new diseases they have gained from this app. Never again will I download an app this stupid. Screw you creators, never talk to me or my sons ever again.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: when you open the app at first it appears normal until you put in your information.... an image of Donald trump being spray tanned then surfaces and he is completely nude in the image. the kids and I just wanted to open the app and view the campaign, instead they are now scarred for life. Jimmy couldn’t even finish his pizza, he was too sick to his stomach as he could not shake the image out of his head. I will NOT be voting for trump #settleforbiden2020. god bless everyone except the trumpies💖 #stanobamaforclearskin
